categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: The Jedi Master Sulan had a Padawan during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A member of the Jedi Order, Sulan's Padawan was killed during one of Sulan's Force-bonding exercises with akk dogs, creatures that were rumored to be Force-sensitive, when a particularly hungry akk dog pack leader attacked the Jedi and killed Sulan's Padawan.

Sulan's Padawan was first mentioned in the Codex entry for akk dogs in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011. The Padawan's species, gender, and name are never identified.
